description: Following its success during Dubai Blockchain Week, Trade the World lands in Hong Kong for its second edition at Consensus Hong Kong. World Liberty Financial, Aster, and Opinion are hosting a private afternoon mixer for traders, founders, researchers, and ecosystem operators who prefer real conversations over conference routines. No panels. No stage. Just good drinks, good food, and a carefully curated room of people who trade, build, and move markets. And yes, we will be doing something fun during the afternoon, including a light, playful trading challenge for those who feel like putting their instincts to the test. Agenda 12:00 12:30: Guest arrival & registration 12:30 12:45: Welcome remarks 12:45 16:00: Mixer session Entry is approval-based. Capacity is limited - please register early. Follow us on X for updates. WLFI: https://x.com/worldlibertyfi Aster: https://x.com/Aster_DEX Opinion: https://x.com/opinionlabsxyz Hanora (Media Partner): https://x.com/Hanora_xyz
